thread.title: Japan urges US to make careful steel trade ruling

title: Japan urges US to make careful steel trade ruling
text:
Japan urges US to make careful steel trade ruling 12:21am IST - 01:41 
Japan's steel industry has criticised President Trump’s plan to impose curbs on steel imports, saying it violates the principles of free trade. As Ciara Lee reports, it’s calling for Washington to make a careful and appropriate decision.
